Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh! Commandant!'}
{3: "You are walking along the corridor when Ayla's voice suddenly rings out from behind. She catches up to you with two packages in her arms."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Commandant! That thing you talked about! It's done!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I didn't expect the game to have KuroStylish clothing data in it. You've been a great help, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's that super famous designer clothing brand in the Golden Age! Their design style is very unique, and the ready-to-wear clothes they made were very popular.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So we decided to reboot the brand, but KuroStylish clothes were discontinued before the Post-Pandemic Age, and most of the related info is lost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "We're still in the process of collecting and restoring clothing designs.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ayla', 3: "We decided to reboot the Golden Age brand, KuroStylish, so we're recovering the relevant design data. I didn't expect that the game would have several actual swimsuit designs that were sold.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's very helpful to the study of the KuroStylish design style, and it's saved me a lot of effort.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So... As a trial run for relaunching the brand, I made the swimsuits that Lee and Liv wore!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla pats the package in her hand and shows you a dazzling smile. You remember seeing her smile like this whenever she creates a satisfying piece of work.'}

{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Commandant, your application to make swimsuits for Constructs would ordinarily not be approved, but if it's a cultural restoration project from the WGAA, it's no problem at all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This swimsuit has a Babylonian touch added to its base design, and to increase utility, I asked the tech department to give input on functionality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So, even if an emergency occurs, you can enter battle immediately too!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'More swimsuits and clothes will come in the future, so look forward to them!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks, Ayla.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "You're welcome. Wearing nice clothes makes you feel better, after all. Even in this world, we cannot give up on our pursuit of beautiful things.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Well, I have to get back to work. Can I ask you to deliver the clothes for me, Commandant? Help me deliver one, I'll deliver the other.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Okay, leave it to me.', 3: '26', 4: 'Why not hand both to me?', 5: '27'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Thanks, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Ummm, well... I kinda want to hear what they think of the clothes in person!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Whose swimsuit should you deliver?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'No problem! I\'ll deliver Lee\'s swimsuit then. I wonder how he\'d react if I tell him this is a "gift from Commandant"?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Arriving at the lounge, you see Liv staring at the screen with a thoughtful expression.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You're here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've been looking up human info in the Golden Age since playing the game.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Apparently, various regions had different festivals and events during the summer in the Golden Age, and students also had a one to two month long summer vacation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'During so, shopping malls had very attractive discount events. People would go out with their friends or lovers to shop and eat together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Some would go to seaside vacation spots and do all sorts of beach activities. Hmm... Like we did in the game that day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Before I became a Construct, I stayed indoors all the time and didn't have many opportunities to go out. These things are also...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Ah, sorry, I couldn't stop myself, Commandant... Did you need something from me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, this is for you.', 3: '42'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This is the swimsuit from the game...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The engineering department wouldn't make this type of coating. Ayla must've made this, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This is made for you, Liv.', 3: '45'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Liv blinks in surprise.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Can I try it on now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv picks up the swimsuit lightly and steps briskly into a small room in the lounge. The soft rustling of fabric can be heard from inside.'}
{3: 'A short while later, Liv walks out of the room.'}
{3: 'The special mobility device beside her gently lifts her body. She lightly spins in the center of the room.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Um, Commandant... How is it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv folds her arms in front of her chest. Though her cheeks are red from shyness, she gazes earnestly into your eyes.'}
{2: 'Yep, it looks really good.', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Since you gave it to me, Commandant, at the very least, I want you to see me in it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But it feels kinda weird to wear clothes like this in the HQ...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's okay. It's just you and me.", 3: '205'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If we were still in the Golden Age, I could have worn something like this and gone on a beach vacation with everyone... Or, no, maybe it's still doable after the war ends...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, is it immature of me to wish for the war to end, because of a swimsuit...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No matter what your wish is, it is the strength that drives you.', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yep, you're right, Commandant. I think... I get it now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The pursuit of freedom, the desire to return home... the small wishes of people come together as one, becoming humanity's will to defeat the virus...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We carry the hopes of all the survivors, and their wishes will be the beacon to guide us on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "My wish is to fill the world with light again, but maybe... also having another little wish of my own, isn't too much to ask for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I hope that one day, we can all be at the beach, playing about and setting fireworks off.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The day will come.', 3: '74', 4: 'It might come sooner than expected.', 5: '75'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes. I will look forward to it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're so sure of it, Commandant. Then I guess I'll trust in you as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "As long as I'm by your side, I know that hope is in sight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "No problem! I can deliver our dear Livvy's swimsuit! I can't wait to see her in it!"}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh yes, this is something Kamui asked me to help with. He said to "just give it to Lee," so please pass it to him too, Commandant!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: "You come to Lee's room and see him busy at his workbench, as expected."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Careful, don't touch anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What are you doing?', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Upgrading things. That's the memory card that Ayla gave you, right? You can hand it to me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee connects the memory card to the VR device, then begins tapping away at the screen.'}
{3: 'Feeling your curious gaze, Lee lets out a small sigh.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's the game Kamui brought. He asked me to make some functional optimizations.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's Golden Age stuff after all. The engine and the graphics are way too outdated. I needed the texture and asset files from Ayla for the graphics, but the rest I can handle on my own.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's a field I'm not familiar with... But, I'll get the hang of it in no time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I never thought you'd help Kamui with this.", 3: '91', 4: "You actually like this game, don't you?", 5: '92'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If I don't help him, he'll still be here nagging me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just an interest on the technical order.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh right, this is for you.', 3: '95'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lee receives the package with a suspicious look in his eyes and opens it.'}
{2: "It's a swimsuit.", 3: '100', 4: "It's a gift of love!", 5: '101'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I know this is a swimsuit. Why are you giving this to me?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because it suits you.', 3: '103'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: "And you looked like you were in a very good mood. It was subtle, but I'm sure your mouth tilted up by a tiny pixel."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You must be mistaking my facial expressions for something else.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Sometimes I really don't understand what you're thinking.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "We are Constructs, weapons for humans to take the world back. So whether its some human video game, or other entertainment, they are all things we shouldn't involve ourselves with.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We exist to complete the missions under your command, so as to bring us all closer to the final victory. I believe the other commandants in the HQ would also think the same way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But you indulge your squad Constructs in playing games, and also give them... these things. You know we won't ever have a chance of using them.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't know for sure.", 3: '110', 4: 'Just accept it on my behalf.', 5: '110'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't know if we'll ever get a chance to wear it, but I'll keep it safe.", 4: '1'}
